Name: sourcefile
Description: full path name of the configuration file

Name: sourceline
Description: line number within the configuration file where the entry appears

Name: seqno
Description: order in which the entries are processed (1..n)

Name: setting
Description: value to be assigned to the parameter

Name: applied
Description: true if the value can be applied successfully

Name: error
Description: if not null, an error message indicating why this entry could not be applied
